question: A magazine wants to include contributions from its readers for an article called “The book that influenced me most”.Write a letter to the editor of magazine about the book that influenced you most. In your letter-	Describe what this book was about-	Explain how this book influenced you-	Say whether this book would be likely to influence other people
text: I am writing this letter to make a suggestion to you about the book that has influenced me most and whose name is "Happy Family".

The book is about two young people who love each other and suffer from a bad economic situation. Her father does not want them to marry because the man does not have enough money to provide for his family.

However, the man struggles to earn a living to have his lover, while the woman waits for him because she does not accept other men. He migrates to another country to earn more money although he has a job in his hometown. After 3 years he returns to his country and has enough money to achieve his goals, so they get married and the story has a good ending.
Since all people have an emotional side, they would like the book. Romantic stories touch people who have a family and they can get into the flow of the story.
Please feel free to get in touch if you have any questions.
